phrs.translation: 单棘豹鲂鮄, 单棘豹鲂, 飞鲂, 飞鲂鮄鱼类

sentences.sentence: Joined a fishing tour to Waterhouse Tasmania at Easter 2010. We caught plenty of flatheads, gurnards, pikes, kingfish, squids and Katy caught a gummy shark!
sentences.translation: 2010年4月参加了一个塔州钓鱼团，钓了很多不同的鱼，有牛鳅鱼、鲂鱼、梭鱼、军曹鱼和墨鱼，团友Katy就钓了一条沙鱼！
